I just started playing this game. Not as easy as i expected since i am pretty good at call of duty. have not ran into many hackers actually have not ran into any of them at all. I believe that is due to me owning the prime version. All in all i would recommend this game to others, but warn them the skill match making is a bit shady since it does not match skill levels up that well.
